overview: Mr. Orovan brings to NewACT years of experience in management and design of telecommunications software solutions. Prior to joining NewACT, Ziv was chief architect for Comverse (Nasdaq:CMVT.PK) Converged Messaging division were he lead the design of the company’s messaging evolution towards IMS. Previously, Ziv managed a group of 40 developers in Comverse MMS division, driving new releases focusing on increased performance and efficiency. Previously Ziv served in a number of R&D management positions at Emblaze Systems (LSE:BLZ.L), EverAd and NetManage (NASDAQ: NETM) where he led worldwide R&D operations and QA.
